txt.en: '[placeholder], you have done well by rescuing Siam from the mine and have proven yourself a friend. Will you, then, as a friend grant me a favour?\n\n'Go to Barnavon-town and tell Gwilum that he still lives and is being cared for here. He will return when he is well enough to travel or when we can spare someone to escort him.'
'Siam lives? So joyous a day! Would that we could feast, but we will thank the spirits for Siam's life, nevertheless.'
The miner Siam has been rescued from the clutches of the bugan in the Barnavon Mine.
Gwilum is outside the gate to Barnavon-town, far to the west of the Barnavon Mine.\n\nCada has asked you to bring the good tidings of Siam's survival to Gwilum.
